description: This file provides utility functions for interacting with the Solana blockchain, including wallet connection, message signing, signature verification, and submitting memo transactions. It also manages a singleton connection instance and detects Phantom wallet provider.

methods.name: getProvider
methods.description: Detects and returns the injected Solana provider (e.g., Phantom) from the window object.

methods.name: connectWallet
methods.description: Connects to the user's Solana wallet and returns the public key in base58 format.

methods.name: disconnectWallet
methods.description: Disconnects the currently connected wallet, if any.

methods.name: signMessage
methods.description: Requests the wallet to sign an arbitrary message and returns the signature and public key.

methods.name: verifySignature
methods.description: Verifies a base58-encoded signature for a message using the provided public key.

methods.name: submitMemoTransaction
methods.description: Submits a memo transaction containing a message to the Solana blockchain, handling errors such as insufficient balance.
